div.p: K.K., R.V.D., J.V.S., and T.V. did the energy, atmospheric, health, and economic modelling, respectively. R.V.D. and T.V. calculated the crop yield impacts. T.V. wrote the paper and created the figures. T.V., A.K., and B.S. conceived the study. M.H. and all other authors contributed to the text.
